tweet_text: @asoalatitun @DavidHundeyin @mykeels Think of population growth rate like money. If I had $1,500 at 2.2% apr or $100,000 at 0.15% apr (ratio of Ghana to China), would you say in time the former would overtake the latter? Sure. But how much time? And why would you even use time as a potential equalizer bw the 2?
